email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $48.50 per metric ton. The laycan window is October 20-25. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised rate. $48.50 is more in line with our expectations. The laycan window also works for us. Can you confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full charter party agreement for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that the rate and laycan work for you. The demurrage rate is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly for your review. Let me know if there are any other details you need. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The demurrage rate is acceptable. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks good on our end. Let’s proceed with the booking. Please confirm once the vessel is fixed. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent news! The MV Ocean Star is now fixed for your cargo. I’ll send you the final confirmation shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah
